mapper.delete: delete from tj_info_pub where xq_code = #{xqCode} and YEAR(oper_date) = #{year} and `month` = #{month}
mapper.select:
select distinct case WHEN MONTH(NOW()) <= 6 then 'up' else 'down' end as monthOfYear,p.month,sum(p.info_count) as infoCount from tj_info_pub as p inner join ht_xq_wy as xw on p.xq_code=xw.xq_code and xw.status=0 inner join ht_wy_info as wy on xw.wy_code=wy.wy_code inner join ht_xq_info xq on p.xq_code=xq.code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode where 1=1 and YEAR(p.oper_date)=YEAR(NOW())
and p.xq_code in (${params.xqCode})
and wy.wy_code in (${params.wyCode})
group by MONTH(NOW()),p.month
